column1: #Text=Dennehy had admitted her crimes ; Stretch and Layton went to trial .
#Text=She killed Lukasz Slaboszewski , 31 , in Peterborough after leading him to believe they were lovers ; he texted a friend " life is beautiful " about the supposed relationship .
#Text=Within two weeks she had gone on to kill housemate John Chapman , 56 , and Kevin Lee , 48 .
#Text=All were stabbed in March last year .
#Text=Lee 's body was found dumped in a ditch clad in a black sequinned dress .
#Text=Lee and Dennehy had been having an affair .
#Text=She told a psychiatrist " I killed to see how I would feel , to see if I was as cold as I thought I was , then it got moreish .
